content: **cara earwarmer** this delicately textured earwarmer is the fall accessory you ve been looking for it utilizes a dk weight yarn to help keep the earwarmer light and not too tight on your head finish this beauty off with a beautiful twist a style that is classic and very easy to wear prepping for a market or holiday gifts this pattern whips up **quick** **skill level** beginner **pattern features** * sized from 6 months to large adult * pattern chart * pictorial * video instructions **tools needed** * size 4mm/g hook or equivalent to obtain gauge * dk weight yarn * darning needle * scissors feel free to resell finished items with pattern credit i would love to see your finished items feel free to tag @knotbadbritt 1 1 https //instagram com/knotbadbritt
